name: Shall We Dance
description:
Shall We Dance is a fully hand-drawn animated fighting game you can only play in local. It's a very straight forward and accessible game designed to provide a fighting game experience even to casual players. Shield blocks sword, sword is faster than spell, and spell attacks through shield… Here's the classical rock-paper-scissors triangle!

Grab a friend and give it a shot! You might have fun ^^

For the anecdote, I invented these monsters when I was 6 or something. It was amazing for me to bring them to life! (so yeah, that's my excuse for having unoriginal monsters ^^ sort of a mix between Yu-Gi-Oh's Kuriboh and Topis that you can see in Super Smash Bros. Melee)
